Text: capzap, use either.  iSerial Reader seems easiest for me.  Both use the same data file that changes monthly.  Try just telling the reader to install the new data, you don't have to replace the application each time.  If you application (iSerial Reader in my case) balks at loading the new data, then its time for the new copy from the bundle you download every month.
